doc.title: Welcome to New York
doc.plot: Gary has decided to bring his girlfriend down to the Bronx,NY to meet his family and friends, however she is very nervous from all of the different things she has heard about the borough. Planning for her welcome, Gary tells his best friend JC, who plots a different plan, due to their ongoing history of child hood pranks on each other. A no holds bar ordeal between the two. So on her arrival, JC decides to hide out until Gary has left for a trip to the store, to make his move. When Gary comes back home he see his girlfriend still in shock from the prank, and before she even says anything he already knows the culprit. He then takes off to confront them, which leads to a hilarious chase.
